newsitem.title: USA: Gardner Denver stake held by Miami investor.
newsitem.headline: Gardner Denver stake held by Miami investor.

text.p: Ira Sochet, a Miami, Fla., investor, said Friday he has purchased a 5.6 percent stake or 273,500 common shares in Gardner Denver Machinery Inc.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Sochet, who is president of broker-dealer Sochet & Co, said he paid $7.7 million for the stake.
He said he bought the shares to acquire a significant equity in Gardner Denver, as an investment and because he considers the shares currently undervalued.
He said his latest transactions include the purchase of 92,700 shares between September 24 and November 7 at prices ranging from $29.78 or $31.78 a share.
Gardner Denver is a Quincy, Ill.,-based maker of air compressors and blower products for industrial applications and pumps used in oil and gas production.
